contentEN:
The first BPM detector update brings a couple of new features for free and in app purchase users. A new setting is added to tweak the accuracy of the BPM calculation. New settings for more app individualization were also added, including a unicorn mode ü¶Ñ. The app is now also available in German. ![App IMG](/assets/img/blog/0009/1.png) # Changelog 1.1.0 30.09.2021

- **Free features** - Added accuracy setting - Added German translation

- **In App Purchase features** - Random BPM color on tap - Random Background color on tap - Unicorn mode ü¶Ñ
## Links - Project: [BPM Detector](/projects/6) - [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/bpm-detector/id1586439275)
